modName: Exits Fantasy Cinema FXAA PPI Preset
summary: Behold, a glorious fantasy preset! Stay a while, and listen!
descriptionHtml:
For so long, I was looking for a great, sort of, fantasy look for Skyrim. Now, I\\\'m not into the custom armor and gigantic \\\"sawblade\\\" weapons, but I did end up creating the look that I desired!

Installation:

First, make sure you have FXAA Post Process Injector for Skyrim. You can find that here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/131

Take the UserSettings.h file in my download and place it in:
(your Skyrim install directory)/injFX_Shaders

Please endorse if you download and enjoy it.

Take a look at the pictures if you want a good preview of it.
author: ExitWound

files.name: Exits Fantasy Cinema FXAA PPI Preset
